snippet.title: RESOGUN PS4: Action Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out action-packed gameplay footage for RESOGUN™, a next generation shoot em' up developed exclusively for the PS4™ system.

Learn more: http://us.playstation.com/ps4/games/resogun-ps4.html

©2013 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Resogun is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
